content.question:
Which of the following is a divergent series?
The harmonic series
A <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-series with <math alttext="p equals one fourth" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>
A <math alttext="p" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-series with <math alttext="p equals pi" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>Ï€</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
